00040 class DepthCam{
00041   public:
00042     float fovH;
00043     float fovV;
00044     int width;
00045     int height;
00046     float minDepth;
00047     float maxDepth;
00049     float f;
00050     
00051     DepthCam();
00053     virtual vector3f depthPixelTo3D(int row, int col, void* depthImage) = 0;
00055     virtual vector3f depthPixelTo3D(int ind, void* depthImage) = 0;
00057     virtual bool isValidDepth(int row, int col, void* depthImage) = 0;
00059     virtual bool isValidDepth(int ind, void* depthImage) = 0;
00061     virtual vector3f depthValueTo3D(int row, int col, void* depthValue) = 0;
00063     virtual float rawDepthToMetricDepth(void* depthValue) = 0;
00064 };

00091     bool isValidDepth(int row, int col, void* depthImage);

00125 class PlaneFilter{
00126   
00127 public:
00129   typedef struct{
00130     // Parameters for vanilla FSPF
00131     unsigned int maxPoints;
00132     unsigned int numSamples;
00133     unsigned int numLocalSamples;
00134     unsigned int planeSize;
00135     float WorldPlaneSize;
00136     float maxError;
00137     float minInlierFraction;
00138     float maxDepthDiff;
00139     unsigned int numRetries;
00140     
00141     // Parameters for polygonization
00142     bool runPolygonization;
00143     float minConditionNumber;
00144     
00145     //Thresholds for polygon merging
00146     double maxCosineError;
00147     float maxPolygonDist;
00148     float maxOffsetDiff;
00149     float minVisibilityFraction;
00150     bool filterOutliers;
00151   } PlaneFilterParams;
00152   
00153 private:
00154   PlaneFilterParams filterParams;
00155   DepthCam* depthCam;
00156   
00157   uint32_t lastRand;
00158   
00160   AccumulativeTimer planeFilteringTimer;
00162   int numSampledLocations, numPlanarPoints, numNonPlanarPoints;
00163   
00164 public:
00165   PlaneFilter();
00166   PlaneFilter(DepthCam *_depthCam, PlaneFilterParams &_filterParams);
00167 
00168   void setDepthCamera(DepthCam *_depthCam){depthCam = _depthCam;}
00169   void setFilterParameters(PlaneFilterParams &params){filterParams = params;}
00170   void setParameters(DepthCam *_depthCam, PlaneFilterParams &_filterParams){setDepthCamera(_depthCam); setFilterParameters(_filterParams);}
00171   
00173   inline bool sampleLocation(void* depthImage, int& index, int& row, int& col, Vector3f& p, int rMin, int height, int cMin, int width);
00175   void GenerateFilteredPointCloud(void* depthImage, vector< vector3f >& filteredPointCloud, vector< vector2i >& pixelLocs, vector< vector3f >& pointCloudNormals, vector< vector3f >& outlierCloud, vector< PlanePolygon >& polygons);
00177   void GenerateCompletePointCloud(void* depthImage, vector<vector3f> & pointCloud, vector<int> &pixelLocs);
00179   void GenerateSampledPointCloud(void* depthImage, vector<vector3f> & pointCloud, unsigned int numPoints);
00181   void GenerateLabelledDepthImage(void* depthImage, int*& labelledDepth, const std::vector< PlanePolygon >& planes);
00183   bool pointIsPlanar(void* depthImage, vector< PlanePolygon >& planes, int ind, float MaxError);
00185   vector<PlanePolygon> findUniqueDepthPlanes(vector< PlanePolygon > planes);
00187   void PointCloudFromRaster(void* depthImage, vector< vector3f >& pointCloud, unsigned int raster);
00189   uint32_t lcgRand();
00191   void getPerformanceStats(double& planeFilteringTime, int& numSampledLocations, int& numPlanarPoints, int& numNonPlanarPoints);
00193   void clearPerformanceStats();
00194 };
